description: 'Template and guidelines for Product Vision'
applyTo: '**/product-vision/**/*.md, **/*-product-vision.md'
---

# Product Vision

A product vision articulates the long-term purpose and aspirational goals of a product, guiding strategy and decision-making.

## When to Use

- Starting a new product or major initiative
- Realigning teams around purpose
- Communicating product direction to stakeholders
- Guiding strategic prioritization decisions

## Template

```markdown
# Product Vision: [Product Name]

## Overview

- **Product**: [Product Name]
- **Owner**: [Product Manager/Product Owner]
- **Last Updated**: [Date]
- **Status**: [Draft / Approved / In Review]

---

## Vision Statement

> [One to two sentences describing the aspirational future state of the product and the impact it will have on users/customers/the world]

*Example: "Empower every developer to ship reliable software with confidence by providing intelligent testing automation that eliminates manual toil and catches issues before they reach production."*

---

## Problem Space

### The Problem We're Solving

[Clear articulation of the core problem, pain point, or opportunity]

### Who Experiences This Problem

| Segment | Description | Pain Level |
|---------|-------------|------------|
| [Segment 1] | [Description] | High/Med/Low |
| [Segment 2] | [Description] | High/Med/Low |
| [Segment 3] | [Description] | High/Med/Low |

### Current Alternatives

| Alternative | Strengths | Weaknesses |
|-------------|-----------|------------|
| [Competitor/Alternative 1] | [Strengths] | [Weaknesses] |
| [Competitor/Alternative 2] | [Strengths] | [Weaknesses] |
| [Do nothing] | [Strengths] | [Weaknesses] |

### Why Now?

[What makes this the right time to solve this problem?]
- [Reason 1: Market trend, technology shift, etc.]
- [Reason 2]
- [Reason 3]

---

## Target Users

### Primary Persona

| Attribute | Details |
|-----------|---------|
| **Name** | [Persona Name] |
| **Role** | [Job title/Role] |
| **Goals** | [What they're trying to achieve] |
| **Pain Points** | [Key frustrations] |
| **Current Behavior** | [How they solve this today] |

### Secondary Personas

| Persona | Role | Key Needs |
|---------|------|-----------|
| [Persona 2] | [Role] | [Primary needs] |
| [Persona 3] | [Role] | [Primary needs] |

---

## Strategic Pillars

### Pillar 1: [Pillar Name]

**Description**: [What this pillar means]

**Principles**:

- [Guiding principle 2]

**Example Initiatives**:
- [Initiative 1]
- [Initiative 2]

### Pillar 2: [Pillar Name]

**Description**: [What this pillar means]

**Principles**:
- [Guiding principle 1]
- [Guiding principle 2]

**Example Initiatives**:
- [Initiative 1]
- [Initiative 2]

### Pillar 3: [Pillar Name]

**Description**: [What this pillar means]

**Principles**:
- [Guiding principle 1]
- [Guiding principle 2]

**Example Initiatives**:
- [Initiative 1]
- [Initiative 2]

---

## Value Proposition

### For [Target User]

- **Who** [has this need/problem]
- **Our product** [is a category]
- **That** [provides this key benefit]
- **Unlike** [alternatives]
- **We** [key differentiator]

### Key Benefits

| Benefit | How We Deliver It |
|---------|-------------------|
| [Benefit 1] | [Mechanism] |
| [Benefit 2] | [Mechanism] |
| [Benefit 3] | [Mechanism] |

---

## Success Metrics

### North Star Metric

| Metric | Definition | Current | Target (12mo) |
|--------|------------|---------|---------------|
| [North Star] | [How it's measured] | [Current value] | [Target] |

### Supporting Metrics

| Category | Metric | Target |
|----------|--------|--------|
| Adoption | [Metric] | [Target] |
| Engagement | [Metric] | [Target] |
| Satisfaction | [Metric] | [Target] |
| Business | [Metric] | [Target] |

---

## What We Will NOT Do

| Out of Scope | Rationale |
|--------------|-----------|
| [Thing we won't do] | [Why it's out of scope] |
| [Thing we won't do] | [Why it's out of scope] |
| [Thing we won't do] | [Why it's out of scope] |

---

## Time Horizons

### Now (0-6 months)
- [Focus area 1]
- [Focus area 2]

### Next (6-12 months)
- [Focus area 1]
- [Focus area 2]

### Later (12+ months)
- [Vision area 1]
- [Vision area 2]

---

## Assumptions & Risks

### Key Assumptions

| Assumption | How We'll Validate |
|------------|-------------------|
| [Assumption 1] | [Validation method] |
| [Assumption 2] | [Validation method] |

### Risks

| Risk | Probability | Impact | Mitigation |
|------|-------------|--------|------------|
| [Risk 1] | High/Med/Low | High/Med/Low | [Mitigation] |
| [Risk 2] | High/Med/Low | High/Med/Low | [Mitigation] |

---

## Related Documentation

- [Product Roadmap](link)
- [Market Research](link)
- [Competitive Analysis](link)
```

## Quality Criteria

- [ ] Vision statement is inspiring and clear
- [ ] Problem space well-defined with evidence
- [ ] Target users clearly identified
- [ ] Strategic pillars guide prioritization
- [ ] Success metrics are measurable
- [ ] Reviewed and approved by leadership
- [ ] Communicated to all stakeholders
